short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block all third-party requests from ldoceonline.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve the load time of ldoceonline.com by blocking all third-party and advertising requests.


Changelog:

1.1.0
- Exclude the domain of the Google Translate API.
